SKILLSHARE X CREATIVE PEP TALK
Our first ever online video course is out now on SKILLSHARE!

Are you looking for your next big break? Whether you’ve NEVER had a big break in your creative career OR you’re a veteran creative who needs a new big break to reinvent yourself: this class is for you!!! Go to https://skl.sh/creativepeptalk to get started!!!

itunes:title: 257 - How to Know What to Make Today to Attract The Right People
itunes:author: Andy J. Pizza
itunes:summary:
Do you ever waste the little time you have worrying about whether you’re making the right thing INSTEAD of actually making it? 

In today’s episode I will give you steps and a tactical strategy that will help you narrow down your options and make 1 piece of work today that will:
- Attract the Right Customers and Clients
- Help You Communicate Who You Are and What Opportunities You Want As an Artist
- Find An Easy Springboard for New Work Hidden in Your Old Work
- CARL WINSLOW OF FAMILY MATTERS REFERENCES!
